EmailTemplate.description: BSKL- Happy Child, Bright Future Invitation
EmailTemplate.name: ! Webinar Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Child, Bright Future: Raising Kids Who Live to Thrive - A Parenting Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
We invite you to attend “Happy Child, Bright Future: Raising Kids Who Live to Thrive” a parenting webinar on Tuesday 9 February 2021 at 3pm (GMT+8).
Hosted by Search Inside Yourself-certified mindfulness teacher (the popular mindfulness & emotional intelligence program created at Google) and mental health coach Komal Chopra Jodha, the webinar will cover:
How to cultivate a home environment that encourages success
Instilling a true love for learning in your child
How happiness is key to unlocking your child’s full potential
RSVP and sign up here: [http://bit.ly/3pPQH6H]
This online event is brought to you by the British International School of Kuala Lumpur.
Kind Regards,
April and Nadia
--
Admissions Team
The British International School of Kuala Lumpur
Tel: +6 (03) 7727 7775
Fax: +6 (03) 7722 1296
www.britishschool.edu.my
